title: Can you return a champion bought with RP?
body:
I heard from a friend that if you buy a champion with RP they can be returned? Does anyone know if that is true? Or if so, can you get a full refund?
({{champion:150}} is the champion if that helps)
If anyone knows anything about this, that would be awesome

replies.body:
Since it sounds like you haven't done any refunds yet, you should be able to get Gnar refunded on your own through the client! I pasted an image below, if you click on Store, then click the button in the upper right of the image, then Purchase History, you'll be able to manually refund him ^_^!

https://i.gyazo.com/ba1ec3c65ea5fb7782eba8509973a706.png
Thanks @Broporo ! Now if I find out I hate Gnar I can return him
Please comment any ideas or suggestions about how I could do this
